title: One Piece: Goat Island Arc (Filler) | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: A comprehensive review and recap of the Goat Island Arc (Episodes 136-138), discussing the arc's strengths and weaknesses as filler content, including Episode 137's focus on Zenny's backstory and dream.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Goat Island Arc

title: One Piece Diaries #18: 'Goat Island' Arc
author: Comic Con Editorial
description: A diary-style review of the Goat Island Arc by someone watching One Piece for the first time, providing fresh perspective on Episode 137 and Zenny's character arc.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Spoilers for Goat Island Arc only

title: 136-138: Zenny of the Island of Goats and the Pirate Ship in the Mountains!
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A blog post reviewing the Goat Island Arc episodes including Episode 137, with personal commentary on Zenny's character and the arc's themes about pursuing dreams.

title: One Piece: 5 Great Filler Episodes Everyone Loved (& 5 That Just Wasted Our Time)
author: CBR Editorial
description: An article ranking One Piece filler episodes, discussing which ones were worth watching and which ones to skip. Mentions the Goat Island Arc in the context of filler quality.
